- Hong Kong Pathology Forum 2021

currentPositions.companyName: PHC-Teddy Joint Laboratory 「標準-觀合聯合實驗室」
currentPositions.description:
「CBSH (Hong Kong)-Teddylab (Shanghai) Joint Laboratory “中生科服(香港）-观合（上海）联合实验室”」

On 12th March 2024, Teddy Clinical Research Laboratory Limited (Teddylab) has reached a strategic agreement with China Biotech Services Holdings Limited (CBSH) (Stock code: 08037.HK) to establish a “CBSH-Teddylab Joint Laboratory” in Hong Kong. 

This cooperation is based on complementing strengths from both parties, through collaboration and development, to achieve a “win-win” situation in promoting the development and the application on cell therapy technology, innovative small molecule and ADC biomedical drug discoveries.

Mission & vision:
1. International and professional CRO services to the upcoming establishment of Government’s Hong Kong Centre for Medical Products Regulation (CMPR), and 
2. Greater Bay Area International Clinical Trial Institute
currentPositions.title: Operation Director (co-operatives)

projects.description:
This is a sharing seminar with on-site workshop of "Biotin interference in immunoassay*". We keep on studying: 
- Function and component
- Discovery history
- Case study 1-3
- Pros & Cons: Small discussion & Debate
- Professional view sharing
- Summary on this seminar 

*To avoid any conflict of interest. This time is without any brand for immunoassay stated and mentioned in Linkedin.

projects.description:
To share "What is Medical Lab?" to the Biomedical Science students or Secondary school students or Foundation Diploma students who are preparing to join Medical Laboratory field as their future career path.

Modules including:
Chapter 1 - Medical Lab classification & workflow
Chapter 2 - Laboratory form
Chapter 3 - Job duties
Chapter 4 - Medical ethics

All information is based on Hong Kong MLTs' registration requirement, academic background & upgrade, different working sectors, and career path to build up.
projects.title: What is Medical Lab?

projects.description:
This is a "online survey" to collect the useful data from Hong Kong citizen during pandemic of COVID-19 including the change under the outbreak.

Aims of a pilot study:
> To determine and test the study protocol (e.g. design of intended questions) and identify weaknesses in a study
> To test the appropriateness of data collection using self-completed questionnaire (e.g. online survey)
> To collect meaningful data for appropriateness of statistical analysis
> To obtain preliminary data successfully for the primary outcome measure in randomized control trials

***Temporarily, we collected over 850 participants to join and complete. (Updated on 26-6-2020)***
projects.title: COVID-19 Project - Pilot Study

Cooperation parties: Innovation and Technology Commission (HKSAR), HKSTP, HKFYG

"Laboratory Diagnosis Acts as a Key of Long-term Preventive Measure in Hong Kong (I)" 
- To share & point out how to prevent from invisible infectious chain
- To discuss the meaning of diagnosis principle, methodology, and etc.

projects.description:
Alzheimer's disease (AD)is neurodegenerative disorder relating to a progressive loss of cognition and memory, changes in personality and behavior. 

> To review and share some insight of some prospective genetic therapy and diagnostic approaches in hope to prevent or cure the AD

I. Cause of Alzheimer's disease (AD) : Beta-amyloid plaques
II. Therapeutic approach : Immunotherapies, CRISPR/Cas9 - APOE4, Statins, etc.
III. Diagnostic approach : ELISA/ IFA/ Western Blotting
IV. Future development 
V. Conclusion - Powerful and Effective Drug

To remind all the care givers that "Don't forget caring with your love to someone with dementia."
projects.title: Current potential therapeutic & Diagnostic approaches of Alzheimer's disease (AD)

projects.description:
To share the up-to-date information of "Total COVID-19 Antibodies" detection in rapid test kit with a PoCT practical workshop

Schedule including:
Section 1 - Symptomatic patient detection (ad-hoc: Scientific consensus & Testing approach)
Section 2 - Asymptomatic patient detection (ad-hoc: IVD, EUA tests for "SARS-CoV-2 Antibodies")
Section 3 - Vaccination check-up
Appendix - For in-depth knowledge of PoCT principle

All information is based on recent and current situation to give some of the examples to share, elaborate, and discuss in different cases studies (e.g. symptomatic Vs asymptomatic; pre-vaccination VS post-vaccination; Serological change, etc. )

*MLT Board CPD: 2.0 (In progress by HKMLTB)
projects.title: Clinical Chemistry Workshop (I): What is Your Guess? 「醫檢研討工作坊I : 你的推論與推斷」

projects.description:
Innocarnival 2021 「創新科技嘉年華2021」held on 28 Oct 2021
Cooperation parties: Innovation and Technology Commission (HKSAR), HKSTP, HKFYG

"The New Normal: Medical Laboratory Tests Post COVID-19"
- To share personal point of view for the new normal of strategy for possible medical laboratory test for screening under continuously and globally COVID-19 pandemic over a year
- To propose monitoring for "Long COIVD" cases for the further patient-care management
- To emphasize for the importance of Vocational Professional Education Training (VPET) in medical laboratory field (e.g. PoCT) 

*Acknowledge to Mr. Henry Chan & Ms. Christine
projects.title: The New Normal: Medical Laboratory Tests Post COVID-19 「香港疫情：醫務檢測新常態」

publications.name: THE 3RD GLOBAL CONGRESS ON PHARMACEUTICAL SCIENCES AND CLINICAL RESEARCH (PSCR 2024) HYBRID

message.text:
Scientific background:
“The pooled prevalence of SLE was 103 (95% confidence interval [CI] – 17 to 224) per 100,000. (Fatoye et al.)”

This is a good partnership to combine and integrate the conventional (ANA, Anti-dsDNA, and Complement system - C3, C4) tests with up-to-dated index tool (by using different pro-inflammatory factors) to make a well-defined disease status even in “low and active” diseasing stages.

For “Dx Systemic Lupus Erythematosus” index,

To classify SLE with different severity:
- low disease activity (<4, range 0-3), to 
- ⁠active disease (≥4, range 4-30)

Now, with an enhancement for the accuracy of detection, the test profile contains most “pro-inflammatory factors” (such as Motif chemokine ligand, interleukin-7 and the others with IFN-α/-γ [secretion mostly by first-line dendritic cells/ by sensitized lymophocytes] to trigger apoptosis of circulating cells, and overproduction of autoantibodies, resulting cutaneous lupus and lupus nephritis.

Additionally with the new biomarker: 
Osteopontin (OPN) acts as a “bridge” to link up extracellular proteins inside osteoblast 

- blocks the activation-induced cell death of macrophages, T cells, fibroblasts and endothelial cells when harmful stimulation.
- prevents non-programmed cell death in inflammatory colitis

Clinical diagnosis:
Normal: 11.8 ng/ml; SLE cases: 42.4 - 79.5 ng/ml (Above mean values for references) (Wirestam et al.)

Comment:
The Lab test combination with add-on value are much better to provide diagnosis and more to be predictable tool. This is very well.

ingestedContentSummary.title: Mayo Clinic Laboratories and Progentec launch lupus advanced biomarker testing services - Insights

message.text:
As a successful outcome of the collaboration announced in 2023, Progentec’s proprietary biomarker blood tests for the proactive management of lupus are now available through Mayo Clinic Laboratories. Progentec Diagnostics, Inc. 

https://bit.ly/4bkvQQ0

This is my honor to have the sincere invitation by PSCR 2024 in Singapore - The Scientific Committee and the Organizer by Prof. Yang, and the great hospitality.

To be invited as the oversea speaker for the title of “Pattern of thyrocardiac disease among patients with hyperthyroidism in Hong Kong”, and the session host of “Metabolic and Endocrine Disorders” in the "THE 3RD GLOBAL CONGRESS ON PHARMACEUTICAL SCIENCES AND CLINICAL RESEARCH
(PSCR 2024) HYBRID" for academic discussion and idea exchange with local and oversea experts such as ICON and Pfizer, looking for prospects and new trend for the development of clinical medicine.

‘Memorable and treasurable PSCR trip.’

Meeting and sharing with some of different professors in different specialties in different countries (e.g. Dr. Rizvi [India] for The Precision medicine of diabetes care, and Prof Chen [China] for Self-Healing and Injectable Hydrogles)

Thank you for my team, my colleagues and my labmates to support in Hong Kong.

Learnt a lots.

ingestedContentSummary.description: The COVID-19 pandemic showed what was possible for gene-based diagnostics. Now comes the true test – economics.
ingestedContentSummary.title: The future of at-home molecular testing

message.text:
The New era of combination: “PoCT & digital telehealth with at-home treatment” 

“Balancing the need for timely information at an affordable price” - by manufacturer

That is true that “Pick up infections early; initiate the appropriate treatment via telehealth consultation in a timely manner.”

In the meanwhile, PoCT development (e.g. LAMP) can speedy the TAT also to come across the risky population at-home, and eliminate the logistic & analytical duration at centralized laboratories.

As a result, “Increasing PoCT sensitivity; Minimizing the false-negative results” is the most important criteria even in any viral detection (e.g. COVID/ RSV/ STD/ HPV, etc).

Non-invasive biomarker: Anti-phospholipase A2 receptor (PLA2R) against podocyte, 

which is one of the important cells to form intercellular junction (with “podocyte foot process”), and membranous barrier for controlling sizable filtration.

ingestedContentSummary.description:
By detecting antibodies against PLA2R, membranous nephropathy can be diagnosed without a kidney biopsy. 
EUROIMUNN offers exclusive test systems for the detection of this important marker.

www.pla2r.com
EUROIMMUN Medizinische Labordiagnostika AG
ingestedContentSummary.title: Anti-PLA2R, an important marker for pMN diagnostics - EUROIMMUN test systems

message.text:
🔬 Anti-PLA2R's Role in Kidney Health 🔬

This World Kidney Day, explore the critical role of anti-PLA2R in diagnosing membranous nephropathy through this concise video: https://lnkd.in/dHxsV6Bv.

Discover how anti-PLA2R detection enhances early diagnosis and treatment, impacting patient outcomes in autoimmune kidney disease.

#WorldKidneyDay #antiPLA2R #KidneyDiseaseManagement
